title: Ticket #3355: condor_chirp fetch is text mode, changes crlf to lf on windows.
description:
The io_proxy layer in the Shadow is responding to a chirp getfile command by opening file in readonly text mode, reading the entire file into memory and then sending the file to the Starter in a single cedar message.

If the file is not a text file with LF only line endings, then the file is modifed by this transfer. Also for pure binary files, often only part of the file is transferred. (presumably it stops at the first ctrl-z.).
